entry.title: Sort Numbers with Two Stacks
entry.content:
explanation

s1 || 1 2 5 4 1
s2 ||

Step 1: 1 -> 2
s1 ||
s2 || 1 4 5 2 1

Step 2: fill s1 with min
s1 || 1 1
s2 || 1 4 5 2 1

Step 3: s2 -> s1
s1 || 1 1 2 5 4
s2 ||

three variables:
global min 1
minCount
sortedNumber

entry.title: 28. Search a 2D Matrix
entry.content:
explanation

二维数组拉成一维数组
因为拉成一条线是sorted， 所以我们可以用Binary Search

start = 0;
end = col * row - 1;
r = index / col;
c = index % col;

time complexity: O(log(mn))
另外如果用两次Binary Search: O（logm +logn） = O(log(mn))
space: O(1)

entry.title: Merge Sort
entry.content:
comparison

time complexityspace complexitystable
Merge SortO(nlogn)O(n)yes
Quick SortAmortized: O(nlogn), worse: O(n^2)O(1)No

quick sort : 先整体有序，再局部有序
merge sort : 先局部有序，再整体有序

entry.title: Quick Sort
entry.content:
explanation

time complexity: O(nlogn)
每层 partition O(n), log 表示每次partition分的很平均， 有logn层
worst cast: O(n^2)， 每次都选到最小值/最大值
space complexity:O(1)

code

entry.title: 82. Remove Duplicates from Sorted List II
entry.content:
explanation

这道题要删掉所有非distinct的node

head一直指向目前知道的最后一个distinct node，
找到一个非distinct 的node，
把之后的值和这个node的value对比，
直到找到下个不一样的值，
head.next 指向他， 但是不改head，因为不知道这个node是不是distinct。

code

entry.title: 40. Implement Queue by Two Stacks
entry.content:
explanation

there are two stacks: stack1 , stack2

  1. push
    directly push into stack1
  2. pop
    if !stack2.isEmpty(), return stack2.pop()
    move stack 1 to stack 2
    return stack1.pop()
  3. top
    if !stack2.isEmpty(), return stack2.peek();
    move stack 1 to stack 2
    return stack2.peek();

    code

entry.title: 104. Merge K Sorted Lists
entry.content:
explanation

  1. method 1: heap
    a) corner case
    b) build min heap
    c) add heads of each lists into heap
    d) curt =poll() and add curt.next into heap
    e) time complexity: O(Nlog(N)), N is the number of nodes

code

entry.title: 544. Top k Largest Numbers
entry.content:
explanation

应该是没有用heapify？

  1. 先建一个初始size为k的min heap
  2. 把array里的数一个个插进去，size>k的时候，pop最小的出去
  3. 剩下一个size为k的min heap，建一个result array，一个个把结果poll出来

code

time complexity

  1. time : O(nlogk)
  2. space: O(k)

entry.title: 612. K Closest Points
entry.content:
explanation

  1. 选最小的k个，维持个size为k的maxheap
  2. comparator a - b 是 最小堆
  3. euclidean distance: (a.x-b.x)^2 + (a.y-b.y)^2
  4. PriorityQueue 是completed binary tree

code

complexity

  1. time: O(nlog(k))
  2. space: O(n)

entry.title: 140. Fast Power
entry.content:
explanation

(a+b) % p = (a%p + b%p) % p
(a-b) % p = (a%p - b%p) % p
(ab) % p = (a%p b%p) % p
(a^b) %p = ((a%p) ^ b) %p

if n is even,
a^n % b = (a^n/2 a^n/2) % b = ((a^n/2 % b) (a^n/2 % b)) % b

if n is odd,
a^n % b = (a^n/2 a^n/2 a) % b = ((a^n/2 % b) (a^n/2 % b) (a % b)) % b

注意Integer overflow的问题

code

entry.title: 159. Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
entry.content:
explanation

没有duplicate

  1. 不能和nums[0]比
    如果nums[mid] < nums[0], 最小在mid左边(include)
    ?如果nums[mid] > nums[0], 最小在mid右边或者左边(无法判断)

  2. 要和nums[length-1]比
    nums[mid] != nums[length - 1]
    if nums[mid] < nums[length -1], target on the left of mid
    if nums[mid] > nums[length - 1], target on the right of mid

code

entry.title: 428. Pow(x, n)
entry.content:
iterative

explanation

Range of int:(32bit) -2,147,483,648 ~ 2,147,483,647
从最小的负数转换成正数会integer overflow

  1. 判断n正负,
    if n < 0 , x = 1/ x, n = -(n + 1)
    if n >=0, no change
  2. iterative (we want log(n))
    a) N-> binary . eg. N= 9 = (1001b)
    b) x^N = x^9 = x^(1001(2)) = x^(2^3 + 2^0) = x^(2^3) * x^(2^0)
    c) tmp = (x^(2^0), x^(2^1), x^(2^2),x^(2^3))
    d) 每次遇到二进制是1时，tmp乘到ans上
    e) 最后处理负的情况

code

recursive

explanation

if n is odd
x^n = x^(n/2) x^(n/2) x
if n is even
x^n = x^(n/2) * x^(n/2)

code

entry.title: 447. Search in a Big Sorted Array
entry.content:
explanation

  1. find range时，从index = 1开始
  2. 比较nums[index-1] 和 target区别
  3. 这道题是find first occurrence

code

complexity

target 在index = n处出现

  1. time: O(log(n))
    如果是10倍10倍的跳
    O(log_10(n) + log_2(10n))
    如果是2倍2倍的跳
    O(log_2(n) + log_2(2n))
    如果是10倍10倍的跳更快
  2. space: O(1)
